body_content.explanation: a note at the side of the text on a document, in a book, etc.:
examples: The side note to the section reads "Penalty on owners of dogs attacking persons or frightening horses".
You can download the form from their website, check off what you want, add little side notes, and fax it in.

body_content.explanation: something such as a comment or fact that is related to the main subject that you are talking or writing about:
examples: As a side note, I do plan to take my young kids to see this film.
On a side note, I don’t subscribe to the argument that patents encourage companies to invest in innovation.
The experiment turned up several dietary side notes worth exploring.
